## VFS.relative() method

Converts an absolute path to a path relative to the current working directory.

**Signature:**

```typescript
relative(path: string, parent?: string): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

path


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The absolute path to convert


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

parent


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

The relative path from CWD

## Example


```typescript
// Assuming CWD is /home/user
fs.relative('/home/user/docs');  // -> docs
fs.relative('/home');            // -> ..
fs.relative('/tmp');             // -> ../../tmp
```
